name: Cipher Pharmaceuticals Inc.
longDescription: Cipher Pharmaceuticals Inc is a specialty pharmaceutical company. Its products include Dermatology Products, Hospital Acute Care Products, and Out-Licensed Products among others. The company's geographical segments include Canada and the United States.
fulldescription: Cipher Pharmaceuticals Inc is a specialty pharmaceutical company. Its products include Dermatology Products, Hospital Acute Care Products, and Out-Licensed Products among others. The company's geographical segments include Canada and the United States.
fullAddress: 209 Oak Park Boulevard,Suite 501, Oakville, ON, CA
